node.statement: For the first term: d/dt Tr[rho(t) log rho(t)] = Tr[delta_AB log rho(t)] + Tr[rho(t) D_log(rho(t))[delta_AB]]. By the Fr√©chet derivative identity Tr[A D_log(B)[C]] = Tr[B^{-1} A C] in the full-rank case, the second part gives Tr[delta_AB] = 0 (since delta_AB is traceless). So d/dt Tr[rho(t) log rho(t)] = Tr[delta_AB log rho(t)].
